location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Brigadier William Coghlan, Political Resident at Aden, to Commander Felix Jones, Resident in the Persian Gulph [Gulf]

mods.abstract: The letter relates to investigations into the whereabouts of a fugitive from Ṣūr, charged with the kidnap of a Somali girl. Coghlan writes that the whereabouts of the accused man is unknown, and requests further details from the Resident about the case.
